FuncDef:
The redirect-cpu http-redirect-chasten command to run to configure the next hop of the packets to send to the CPU according to limits of idle web users.
The undo redirect-cpu http-redirect-chasten command disables the configuration of redirection to the next hop.
By default, the next hop of the packets to send to the CPU according to limits of idle web users function is not configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Limits of idle web users: Configure this behavior upstream on global UCL to redirect matched pre-authentication packets to new cp-car.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
